import React from "react"; //can set the twitter/gh/linkedin Links below so they work. function About() { const people = [ { name: 'James Burns', role: 'Susipiciously Important Sounding Title', imageUrl: "https://i.ibb.co/F7QtvQd/Resized-James.jpg", bio: '"Not a single notable skill that would make him stand out in a crowd" - My mom', twitterUrl: '#', linkedinUrl: '#', }, { name: 'Jay Tipre', role: 'Chief Blockchain Officer', imageUrl: "https://i.ibb.co/kcW7pSz/Jay-founder-picture.jpg", bio: "I think we could solve homelessness quite quickly if we simply utilized the benefits of blockchain technology. How?? Give me $10 Million and I'll build you an MVP.", twitterUrl: '#', linkedinUrl: '#', }, ] return (

Our Team

An eclectic collection of dreamers, doers, drinkers, debaters, digressers, and debaucher-ers.

    {people.map((person) => (

  • {person.name}

    {person.role}

    {person.bio}

    • Twitter
    • LinkedIn
    • ))}
) } export default About;
